entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
